pageTitle: Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Thursday, October 27, 2022 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

National Capital Region, Canada

Private meetings

The Prime Minister will speak with the Prime Minister of the United Kingdom, Rishi Sunak.

5:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will hold a bilateral meeting with the Secretary of State of the United States of America, Antony J. Blinken.

Office of the Prime Minister
West Block
Parliament Hill

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity at the start of the meeting
